en: Password must be at least 8 characters
Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
Password must contain at least one number
Password must contain at least one special character (!@#$%^&*)
Name must be at least 2 characters
Company name must be at least 2 characters
Min 8 chars, 1 uppercase, 1 number, 1 special char

ko: 비슷한 이름의 회사가 이미 존재합니다. 다른 이름을 선택해주세요.
en: Company with similar name already exists. Please choose a different name.
Account is locked. Try again in {minutes} minutes.

ko: 이 계정은 OAuth 로그인을 사용합니다. Google 또는 Azure로 로그인해주세요.
en: This account uses OAuth login. Please login with Google or Azure.
